title: Detailing Agreements from US DOGE Service and GSA to Department of Education

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Detailing Agreements from US DOGE Service and GSA to Department of Education
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like to request Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) or other documentation related to detailing individuals from the US DOGE Service (USDS) to the Department of Education. These should include the following individuals:

From USDS
Adam Ramada (detail started on 1/28/2025)
Jennifer Balajadia (detail start date unknown, but likely around Adam Ramada's)
Alexandra Beynon (detail around 2/5/2025)
Jordan Wick (detail around 2/20/2025)

From GSA
Ethan Shaotran (detail around 2/20/2025)
Edward Coristine (detail around 2/20/2025)

These detailing arrangements should also have been concluded, so I would like to request communications related to the onboarding and offboarding of these individuals if possible. Thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jacob Harris

title: Visitor Logs for DOGE-Affiliated Staff Around 2/3/2025

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Visitor Logs for DOGE-Affiliated Staff Around 2/3/2025
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like to request the building visitor logs for the period of several days around February 3, 2026 for the main Department of Education HQ in Washington, DC. There were news reports of multiple DOGE staff present in the building for that day, but I would appreciate adjusting the day if the actual visitation was a few days earlier or later. These visitors would likely be going to the office of the Secretary of Education.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jacob Harris
